title: padamalarE gatiyena
sahitya:
padamalarE gatiyena nambinEnayyA nin


anupallavi

  shatamalavE nidam urutuyar palavE daraNiyil tanajana ghanam
 enum inamoDum uravu kanavu nigarumenum ninaivoDu vanaja


caraNam    tavam ariyEn jnyAn anubhavam ariyEn vEdaAnta tattuvam ariyEn
 bhaktiyin ilakkaNam ariyEn mettakkai tavamuDaiyEn pErANavam uudaiyE
 Ayinum ninnAdaravu tandaruLi enran uLakkAdaravu tIrttaruLu mUrti enrun
